properties.title: Long Point
properties.description: Primary sector — 6+ V0-V3 problems including Lakeshore Slab ⭐ and Easy Traverse ⭐. Exposed (no shelter). Flat lakebed landings. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Pirates Cove
properties.description: Secondary sector — V0-V3 problems including Cove Jug Haul (only partially sheltered problem at Summersville). Exposed. Flat lakebed landings. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Orange Oswald Wall Area
properties.description: Cliff-base sector — intermediate-to-hard problems. Minimal cliff shelter. Talus/mixed landings. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Long Point Trailhead Parking
properties.description: Gravel lot, 10-15 vehicles. WV Rt. 129. Free, no fee. Access all Summersville Lake sectors from here. [UNVERIFIED]
